ShortDescription.Value: This Pack adds 6 subway variations, consisting of different lengths

Publish.LongDescription:
## Subway Variation Asset Pack This Pack adds 6 single subway train variations in different lengths.
## New Assets - Subway Train (3 Segment) (cap. 390) - Subway Train (4 Segment) (cap. 540) - Subway Train (5 Segment) (cap. 690) - Subway Train (6 Segment) (cap. 840) - Subway Train (Double, 3 Segments) (cap. 1380) - Subway Train (Double, 4 Segments) (cap. 1680)
